traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the crocodile can't bite another target
